modName: DragonPriest Masks Cloth Light heavy Armored Circlets
summary: if you have a dragonpriest\'s mask on your inventory you can craft at forge 3 versions of the same mask: cloth, light and heavy all with circlet skin. You can also temper Light and heavy model.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all! :)

Today I talk you about Dragonpriest\'s masks. 
Very powerful artfacts but sometimes useless. They covers character\'s face, and sometimes are not compatible with the trained kind of armor. 
So, why don\'t wear a DragonPriest\'s mask with the right armor model and a better beautiful appearance, like circlet?

DESCRIPTION:

There are 9 DragoPriest\'s Masks in the game, for each one there is this chance:
if you have a dragonpriest\'s mask on your inventory you can craft at forge 3 versions of the same mask, cloth, light and heavy.

All models are in Daedric Crafting List, they look like circlets and you need no perk to craft \'em. 

The armor rating is the same of the original models, 21 for light and 23 for heavy. 

This mod does not change original models, all craftable models are new.

All models can not be unenchanted to learn the enchantments.

You can temper all light and heavy models but you need arcane blacksmith perk. If you want a better armor you need Daedric perk too.

Crafting List: 
cloth, light and heavy model need the same ingretients:

Hevnoraak: 3 Iron Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Iron Ingot
Konahrik: 5 Gold Ingots. Tempering: 1 Gold Ingot
Krosis: 3 Iron Ingots + 2 Gold Ingots. Tempering: 1 Iron Ingot
Morokei: 3 Moonstones + 3 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Moonstone
Nahriin: 3 Ebony Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Ebony Ingot
Otar: 3 Malachite + 2 Gold Ingots. Tempering: 1 Malachite
Rahgot: 3 Orichalcum ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Orichalcum Ingot
Vokun: 3 Steel Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Steel Ingot
Volsung: 3 Corundum Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Corundum Ingots

REQUIREMENTS:
only Skyrim :)

INSTALLATION:
overwrite Data Folder
Turn on \"DragonPriests Masks by Cybertron77.esp\" in the mod list.

UNINSTALLATION:
Before uninstall, unequip all dragonpriest circlets by your characters and save.
Delete the file \"DragonPriests Masks by Cybertron77.esp\" in the Data folder.
author: Cybertron77
